analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure a smooth user experience.
insights: The "How It Works" page has a longer duration than the other pages, indicating potential issues that need to be addressed. It is crucial to investigate and optimize this page to ensure it passes future performance tests.
The Time to First Byte (TTFB) for all pages is within an acceptable range, indicating that the server response time is good.
First Contentful Paint (FCP) is also within an acceptable range for all pages, meaning that the initial rendering of the page is fast, providing a good user experience.

To improve the web performance, it is recommended to optimize images, minify CSS and JavaScript, leverage browser caching, and consider using a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to distribute content closer to users, reducing latency and improving load times.
